title: Will Greg Miller Come Back to Avengers for Mighty Thor? Kinda Funny Live Reactions
description:
Today, we got our first look at Jane Foster AKA Might Thor in Marvel's Avengers. Will she bring Greg back to the game tomorrow? Let's find out!

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody welcome to a reaction here on youtube.com kind of funny games previously recorded live on twitch.tv kind of funny games where mike mike plays was watching and said it was perfect how i had it because i moved something around i think it's perfect as it is my name is greg miller and if you don't know i'm one of the five people who still loves avengers and when i say still loves avengers i mean i haven't actually played marvel's avengers since they dropped the spider-man content because then i i had a baby and then they dropped spider-man and then i played spider-man it was great but then i couldn't team up with my usual group that i have a text message thread with and then i said well no big deal they keep saying they're gonna put out a road map by the end of the year and then that didn't happen and they said we're gonna put our road map soon and then that didn't happen and then they said we're just gonna talk when we're ready to talk and i was like you know what i

then that didn't happen and they said we're gonna put our road map soon and then that didn't happen and then they said we're just gonna talk when we're ready to talk and i was like you know what i can wait and i haven't turned on avengers since but i'm still excited to get back to play avengers and maybe mighty thor will be the reason i turn it back on if you didn't know they are adding jane foster aka mighty thor to the game and today they did air dropped not air drop they dropped uh a war table deep dive from the mighty thor you see it here over here you see it happening over here it's rated t for team it's six minutes long i was gonna watch it with my morning coffee and then i said well if i'm watching on my morning coffee why not watch it with a few dozen best friends on twitch.tv kind of funny games and then later maybe if it's good on youtube.com slash kind of funny games so we're gonna start it now if you are watching on youtube and you're like man the sound balance sucks you

of funny games and then later maybe if it's good on youtube.com slash kind of funny games so we're gonna start it now if you are watching on youtube and you're like man the sound balance sucks you can blame twitch chat over in twitch chat they're the ones who said what the sound balance should be they will throughout this they will continue to bicker about it but they are the ones who set it up so that's how it's got to be that's how it's got to be ladies and gentlemen we begin it in three two one i have not watched this ahead of time we just heard the beginning to make sure the audio balance is right again remember it's blame the twitch chat sure if you're a youtube person come on over twitch.tv such kind of funny games be like you [ __ ] ruin the sound balance [Music] so now here's the i was never a big thor man i always wanted to like thor but that was always shawn's character in our avengers dude and so i was i'm always a cat guy jane foster is the mighty thor for she is worthy

i was never a big thor man i always wanted to like thor but that was always shawn's character in our avengers dude and so i was i'm always a cat guy jane foster is the mighty thor for she is worthy first off she looks amazing there's an amazing look for this care assemble your team mid guardians the goddess of thunder has arrived in marvel's avengers our new hero jane foster is the mighty thor she is a ferocious force of nature with even more precise control of mjolnir she like odin son before her is thor her new twist on playing as a god of thunder means new team compositions and fresh co-op play this allows original approaches to community events end-game omega-level threats and raid challenges jane foster is a gifted doctor known for her skills and compassion for others but fate had an even higher calling for her as the legendary goddess of thunder the mighty thor the story of jane's epic transformation into the goddess of thunder original great series comics written by jason aaron

even higher calling for her as the legendary goddess of thunder the mighty thor the story of jane's epic transformation into the goddess of thunder original great series comics written by jason aaron she first appeared as the goddess of thunder in issue one of 2014's thor after thor odinson becomes unworthy to wield his hammer mjolnir sits dormant on the moon many tried to pick it up but none are deemed worthy until jane who is battling cancer hears mjolnir calling out to her wielding the awesome weapon she transforms into the mighty thor her adventures continued in 2015's mighty thor series and 2019's war of the realms culminating in an epic conclusion of jane's arc when she transcends mortality and is reborn as valkyrie in marvel's avengers jane the mighty chat says a hermit homeboy says 2014 feels like it was more recent rift in space time caused by tachyon anomalies in her alternate timeline jane became the goddess of thunder when thor gave up mjolnir after a date stricken with

2014 feels like it was more recent rift in space time caused by tachyon anomalies in her alternate timeline jane became the goddess of thunder when thor gave up mjolnir after a date stricken with grief over the tragedy and jane's cancer diagnosis that followed when jane takes on the powers of thor her illness is held at bay there's no going back to her normal life now she must fight on as the mighty thor jane's mighty thor possesses all the strength and power of a god of thunder and is a wielder of mjolnir that's the difference i'm watching thor odinson up close have allowed the good doctor to fight with mjolnir like a natural-born god however jane's relationship with mjolnir isn't that of a son of asgard and she deploys the mighty hammer in ways that odinson never did jane's unique talent with mjolnir begin with all mother's blessing her new unique intrinsic ability and god tempest her new overcharge inspired by the elder god sealed within mjolnir all mother's blessing builds its

with mjolnir begin with all mother's blessing her new unique intrinsic ability and god tempest her new overcharge inspired by the elder god sealed within mjolnir all mother's blessing builds its overcharged meter with melee attacks and once full unleashes her god tempest which increases ranged hammer damage and creates shock waves with each hit all mother's blessing and god tempest can be modified with mastery skills to boost damage increase the strength of shock waves and improve intrinsic generation and duration in her comics jane frequently shows more finesse with milner than the odinson and that shines through in several new features in her combat kit this includes quickfire a new ranged attack combo that allows the mighty thor to make a second more powerful ranged attack by timing her next throw as she catches mjolnir on its return jane's abilities such as her ranged power attack draw their inspiration from the epic combat in the comics a great example of this is the seek and pin

next throw as she catches mjolnir on its return jane's abilities such as her ranged power attack draw their inspiration from the epic combat in the comics a great example of this is the seek and pin upgrade to her ranged attack which empowers mjolnir to seek out and pin enemies without needing to aim well that's great that was a pain in the butt is full even extends to melee strikes with earth's finest which adds a hammer toss to her light attack combo for extra reach jane also puts her own spin on classic odinson moves like headstrong she relies on her thunder you have the mighty thor's kit culminates in the all weapon her brand new ultimate heroic drawn from the pages of the thor and valkyrie runs jane sends mjolnir to seek and destroy nearby enemy targets on its own meanwhile she calls forth undyarn the all weapon to protect herself reducing all damage taken while smiting her foes the all weapon has a full set of specializations and allows you to customize mjolnir's strikes making

forth undyarn the all weapon to protect herself reducing all damage taken while smiting her foes the all weapon has a full set of specializations and allows you to customize mjolnir's strikes making them faster referencing the headstrong status against nearby enemies jane can even use mjolnir as a personal orbiting defense shield the addition of the mighty thor creates new team opportunities by adding a third flying warrior to the avengers roster jane leans into thor's lightning-driven kick while adding excitement only thousands of these robots have emerged epic enemy obliteration with the yarn in addition to her awesome god-like combat abilities jane has a variety of outfits drawing inspiration from the comics additionally jane boasts unique takedowns emotes and name plates she also has her own hero challenge card and mission chain allowing you to earn special rewards including exclusive cosmetics and intel documents that delve deeper into jane's story the goddess of thunder brings

her own hero challenge card and mission chain allowing you to earn special rewards including exclusive cosmetics and intel documents that delve deeper into jane's story the goddess of thunder brings fresh gameplay to marvel's avengers but not fresh content unstoppable force of nature that new players and seasoned vets alike will want to experience our recent changes to the leveling flow in update 2.3 and event rewards in update 2.4 make gearing a new hero smoother and more rewarding than ever it's a great time to jump back into marvel's avengers so get your team together and call down lightning on your foes olive party says get ready to do the old raid again and again and therein lies the problem ladies and gentlemen june 28th that's tomorrow ladies and gentlemen the mighty thor is out there no no no no all right kevin always does the thing where he makes it loop how does he do that settings uh i don't know it's six minutes i'm not going to talk no hey mix it oh ladies gentlemen uh
